name: Unifysquare
overview:
Unify2 was founded by a team of Microsoft veterans that have played a pioneering role in the UC space, including seeding Microsoft’s Real–Time Collaboration efforts and driving the roadmap, design and development of Office Communications Server. Unify2 is a rapidly growing Bellevue, WA-based technology startup with the vision of helping global enterprises transform their business through transforming the way they communicate. Unify2 is considered a global leader in unified communications, serving over 33 Fortune 500–class enterprise customers around the globe.

Unify2 is seeking top talent to help us realize our vision through innovative and game changing products and solutions. We are seeking talent across all functions including product development, consulting, operations, sales and marketing. We are hiring in the US, EMEA and APAC. We offer qualified professionals a challenging and rewarding career opportunity in a friendly and supportive work environment. We provide competitive pay, stock options, and a comprehensive benefit package, including medical, dental, vision, disability and life insurance, as well as a 401(k) plan, paid time off and paid holidays.

Visit http://www.unifysquare.com for more information.
